description: Demolition of existing building on the site and the construction of 2, 3 and 4 storey buildings (some with an additional floor of accommodation in the roof space), to provide 40 self contained flats and 24 houses (all Use Class C3), together with new access from Amberden Avenue, associated car parking, cycle spaces, private amenity space, communal amenity space and landscaping.
